edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, editor; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator

text.0:
Hestia, you who tend the holy house of the lord Apollo, the Far-shooter at goodly
 Pytho , with soft oil dripping ever from your
 locks, come now into this house, come, having one mind
text.1: with Zeus the all-wise —draw near, and withal bestow grace upon my song.

author: homeric hymns
